title: (x) "& Services" sans serif w/ unique ampersand - Blue Highway {Florian}
content:
Can anybody help me identify this font? I thought I recognized it a few times, but the question mark sign is just too unique.

Thanks.

| --- | --- |
| [services text.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008105501/http:/typophile.com/files/services%20text.jpg) | 79.95 KB |

author: zeckdude

comments.content: … which is a really poor digitization. Go with Interstate. ;^)
